channel.title: Comments on: Plot functions using the special-filenames property

item.title: By: Jacquelyn
item.dc:creator: Jacquelyn
item.description: I'm really loving the theme/design of your site. Do you ever run into any internet browser compatibility issues? A couple of my blog readers have complained about my website not working correctly in Explorer but looks great in Firefox. Do you have any recommendations to help fix this issue?
item.content:encoded: I’m really loving the theme/design of your site. Do you ever run into any internet browser compatibility issues? A couple of my blog readers have complained about my website not working correctly in Explorer but looks great in Firefox. Do you have any recommendations to help fix this issue?
